definition: difference/discrepancy/to differ/error/to err/to make a mistake
to differ from/to fall short of/lacking/wrong/inferior/Taiwan pr. [cha1]

sentences.english: Could I see your ID and the notice left by the postman?
sentences.chinese: 请借我看身分证和邮差留下的通知。

sentences.english: The work of "Deliver" was created with the inspiration from postmen.
sentences.chinese: 《传递》这一作品，我是从邮差投递信件想到的。

sentences.english: One of my friend became a postman recently.
sentences.chinese: 我有个朋友最近做了邮差。

sentences.english: Suddenly the postman was a regular at the Hagadorn house.
sentences.chinese: 溘然，邮差成了艾米家的常客。

sentences.english: The mailmen are dressed in green in our country.
sentences.chinese: 在我们国家，邮差穿绿色衣服。

sentences.english: All I have is just a note left by the postman.
sentences.chinese: 我只收到一张邮差留下的通知。

sentences.english: Mr. Postman would walk up the street with a bundle of letters in his hand.
sentences.chinese: 邮差先生走到街上来，手里拿着一大把信。

sentences.english: A postman delivers mail three times a day. But he brought no letter yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 邮差一天送信三次，可是昨天没有带信来。

sentences.english: The dog gave the mailman a nasty bite.
sentences.chinese: 这条狗将邮差猛咬一口。

sentences.english: Suddenly the postman was a regular at the Hagadorn house.
sentences.chinese: 突然，邮差成了艾米家的常客。

sentences.english: Heliconius provides a model for a different kind of study.
sentences.chinese: 对于邮差蝴蝶的研究提供了一种不同的研究模型。

sentences.english: And pooches that tagged along with mail carriers so loyally that they became the stuff of legend.
sentences.chinese: 邮差狗非常忠诚地紧随着邮递员因此已经成为了传奇。

sentences.english: The mailman delivers letters and parcels every morning.
sentences.chinese: 邮差每天早晨递送信件和包裹。

sentences.english: Your dog is running after the postman.
sentences.chinese: 你的狗正追着邮差跑呢。

definition: Vincent Van Gogh (1853-1890), Dutch post-Impressionist painter
Orwell (name)/George Orwell (1903-1950), British novelist, author of Animal Farm 動物農場|动物农场 and 1984 一九八四年
William Faulkner (1897-1962), American novelist and poet
Sir Arthur Conan Doyle (1859-1930), author of the Sherlock Holmes stories 歇洛克·福爾摩斯|歇洛克·福尔摩斯
Wylie (name)/Turrell Wylie, originator of the Wylie transcription of Tibetan script
Vincent Van Gogh (1853-1890), Dutch post-Impressionist painter
